tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE perishable_goods_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    storage_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    action_type TEXT,
    quantity_change INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Suppliers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name STRING,
    contact_person STRING,
    email STRING,
    phone_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Orders (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    product_id UUID,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    supplier_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Sales (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    product_id UUID,
    quantity_sold INT,
    sale_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    supplier_id INT
);
